ygData.subject: RE: power level to X?/kiting
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmmm druid DoT are: 	14th DoT do 120 damage in 60 sec 24th DoT do 180 damage in 60 sec 29th DoT and -AC on target 182 damage in ? sec (Resisted a lot cause
ygData.messageBody:
Hmmm druid DoT are: 14th DoT do 120 damage in 60 sec
24th DoT do 180 damage in 60 sec
29th DoT and -AC on target 182 damage in ?
sec (Resisted a lot cause it lower AC
and can stack with the other)
34th DoT do ? damage in ? sec

Those spell can`t stack except for the 29th but it`s too much resisted so we
didn`t use it

So our DoT can`t stack and Shaman DoT can .. I really think that Shaman have
better DoT spell then ours

Hope this help

Cya

Simbad

> From: Joel Thronburg <jthronburg@...>
>
> Druids have DoT's that are FAR more mana efficient than ours.
> At least
> until we get envenomed breath at 24. This last patch even
> increased the
> power of their DoT's.
>
> > From: "Omeg Felligan" <omeg_felligan@...>
> >
> > Shaman's are the best kiters right? B/c they get SoW at 9th, and
> > Druids
> > don't get it till 14th...or are the Druid DOTs that much better?
> >
> > hmmm...maybe I will stick with the shaman :).
> >
